Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® Serum Separator (SST™) Blood Collection Tubes
Specimen Container(s): BD Vacutainer® Serum Separator (SST™) Blood Collection Tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer Serum Separator (SST™) Blood Collection Tubes for collection and preparation of serum specimens for chemistry and therapeutic drug monitoring
Indications for Use Summary: Sterile, single use tube for collection, containment, transport, and centrifugation of venous blood specimens to obtain and store serum for in vitro diagnostic testing in chemistry and for monitoring certain therapeutic drugs
